articles.title: Swimming: Caeleb Dressel shatters world record to win 100m butterfly at Tokyo Olympics - CNA
articles.description: TOKYO: American powerhouse Caeleb Dressel smashed his own world record to win the men's Olympic 100m butterfly title on Saturday (Jul 31) for his third gold medal of the Tokyo Games.
articles.content:
